15857.「それには およばんぞ！: I'm not going to let you do that!

15858.「約束通り わしとオーレンの関係を\n 話しにきてやったのだ。感謝せい！:
As promised, I'm here to tell you about my
relationship with Oren. You should be
thankful!

15859.「おおっ。これは エイドスさま！\n お待ちしておりましたぞ。\n ささ。どうぞ:
Oh, wow. Oh, Mr. Eidos! We have been waiting
for you. Whisper it. This way, please.

15860.「……ふん。\n ちょうど メンツは そろっておるな。\n では さっそく 始め:
Well...hmmm. The members are all in order.
Let's get started right away.

15861.「どこから 話したものか……。\n まず お察しの通り 生前のオーレンと\n わ:
I don't know where to begin, but as you may
have guessed, Oren and I knew each other
before he died.

15862.「グレンの剣聖オーレンと 若き賢者エイドス。\n 剣と賢……進む道は ちがえど:
Oren, the Sword Saint of Glen, and Eidos, the
young sage. Swords and sages...although their
paths were different, they were friends.

15863.「……あんなことが なければ\n 今でも そうだったかも知れんな。:
...I might still be if it weren't for what
happened to me.

15864.「オーレンが ベコン渓谷の調査に向かい\n 途中で 失踪したことは知っていよう？:
You may know that Oren disappeared while on his way to investigate Becon Valley. That investigation was into demon miasma in the
canyon.

15865.「オーレンは 部下を引き連れ 渓谷に入った。\n しかし 肝心の調査ポイントに着:
Oren entered the canyon with his men. But before they could reach the crucial research point, they were caught in a spew of demon
miasma.

15866.「魔瘴に侵された 彼らを救うため\n オーレンは わしに 助けを求めた。\n 無:
Oren asked for my help to save them from the
demon miasma. Of course, I was willing to
offer my advice.

15867.「レムルの聖杯で 受けとめた\n グロリスのしずくだけが 魔瘴のチカラを\n 打:
Only a Droplet of Gloris received by Lemur's
Chalice can counteract the power of demon
miasma...

15868.「あの頃は わしも若かった。\n 知識だけ与えれば 人を救えると思っていた。\n:
Back then, I was young. I thought I could save
people by just giving them knowledge. I didn't
even think about the consequences.

15869.「わしの話は ここまでじゃ。\n これ以上は……正直 語りとうない。:
That's all I have to say. I honestly don't
want to talk about it any more.

15870.「正気を取り戻した 妖剣士オーレンなら\n 聖杯を持って ランドン山脈の雲上湖に:
If it was Swordmaster Oren who came to his
senses, he'd have taken the chalice and gone
to Cloudtop Lake in the Landon Mountains.

15871.「今のやつには 誰の声も届かん。\n 結局 また くり返してしまうのじゃな……。:
No one's voice can reach him now. In the end,
he'll do it all over again...

15872.「わかったような わからんような……？: I think I understand, but I don't know...?

15873.「ひとつ言えるのは どうやら オーレンは\n 歴史書に 記されているような\n:
One thing is for sure, Oren is apparently not
the big bad guy that the history books make
him out to be....

15874.「エイドスさまは オーレンが 聖杯を持って\n 雲上湖に向かったと おっしゃって:
Mr. Eidos said that Oren went to Cloudtop Lake
with the chalice.

15875.「……<pc>どの。\n すまぬが ひとつ 頼まれてくださらんか？:
...<pc>. I'm sorry, but would you do
me a favor?

15876.「ここまで 聞いてしまった以上\n 私は オーレンが 何をするつもりなのか\n:
Now that I've heard all this, I want to see
what Oren is going to do until the end.

15877.「しかし 一国の大臣としては\n おいそれと 城を離れるわけにも いきませぬ。\:
However, as a minister of a country, I cannot
leave my castle so easily. Therefore, I would
like to entrust you with my thoughts.

15878.「ランドン山脈の雲上湖まで 行って\n 妖剣士オーレンの行いを見届け\n 私に:
Will you go to Cloudtop Lake in the Landon
Mountains, witness Swordmaster Oren's deed,
and report back to me?

15879.「おお 引き受けてくださるか！\n やはり <pc>どのも この件が\n どうな:
Oh, you'll take care of it! I guess
<pc> is also interested in how this
will turn out.

15880.「それでこそ おまかせできるというもの。\n では くれぐれも 頼みましたぞ！:
That's why we can leave it to you. Now then, I
ask you to take care of it!

15881.「お気持ちは うれしいのですが\n どうやら 他の方からの頼まれごとで\n お忙:
I appreciate your concern, but it seems that
you are busy with other requests.

15882.「どうか 先に そちらを片付けてから\n また 私に 話しかけてくだされ。:
Please, first take care of that first, and
then talk to me again.

15883.「……むむう 残念ですなぁ。\n この件を託せるのは <pc>どのを\n おいて:
...mmmm, what a pity. I would have trusted
<pc> with this one and no one else...

15884.「もし 気が変わりましたら\n すぐにでも 私に 話しかけてくだされ。:
If you change your mind, please talk to me
right away.

15885.「これが グロリスのしずく……。\n これがあれば あいつらを\n 救ってやるこ:
This is the Droplet of Gloris...is this what I
need to save those guys?

15886.「……貴様。\n さては ガートラントの追っ手だな？: You. You must be Gartlant's man.

15887.「悪いが 今 このレムルの聖杯を\n 返すわけには いかぬのだ。\n 無理にでも:
I'm sorry, but I cannot return this Lemur's
Chalice now. I will force my way through!

15888.<center>お行きくださいませ オーレン様。\nこの者は 私が止めておきまし: Please go, Mr. Oren. I will stop him.

15889.「おのれ ガートラントの追っ手め！\n こりずに また 来たかっ！:
Hail, Gartlant's hunters! I wish I'd come back
for more!

15890.<center>お行きくださいませ オーレン様。\nこの者は 私が止めておきまし: Please go, Mr. Oren. I will stop him.

15891.<center>オーレンさ……ま。\nど…うか ご無事で……。: Mr. Oren... hello. I hope you're all right.

15893.「……やれやれ。\n やはり 来てしまったのだな。\n そんなことだろうと思って:
Oh, dear. I knew you'd come. I knew it would
be something like that.

15894.「水竜ギルギッシュを 倒したか。\n あれも オーレンと同じく\n あわれな最期:
Did you defeat Gilgish the water dragon? Like
Oren, it was the result of a soul that met a
tragic end.

15895.「……この間の話の 続きをしようか。:
Let's continue where we left off the other
day.

15896.「魔瘴に侵された部下たちを 救うには\n レムルの聖杯が必要だと知った オーレン:
Knowing that the Lemur's Chalice was needed to
save his men from the demon miasma, Oren went
to Gartlant in search of the Chalice.

15897.「だが 持ち主の大商人は 強欲な人物でな。\n 部下のために 聖杯を使わせてほし:
But the owner, a wealthy merchant, was a greedy man. He refused to listen to Oren's request that he be allowed to use the chalice
for the benefit of his men.

15898.「途方にくれるオーレンを救ったのは\n 大商人のひとり娘 パリンじゃった。:
Oren was at a loss, but was saved by Palin,
the daughter of a wealthy merchant.

15899.「オーレンの高潔さに触れ 恋焦がれた娘は\n 聖杯を持ち出して オーレンに渡した:
Touched by Oren's integrity, the girl, in love with him, took the chalice and gave it to Oren. She gave it to Oren on the condition
that he take her with him.

15900.「しかし それは 軽率な行いじゃった。\n パリンの父は 娘と聖杯が 奪われたと:
But it was a rash act. Pauline's father claimed that his daughter and the chalice had been taken from him, and Oren was now a hunted
man.

15901.「グロリスのしずくを欲する オーレンは\n ガートラントからの追っ手を振り切って:
Oren, who wanted the Droplet of Gloris,
somehow managed to get to this Cloudtop
Lake, fending off pursuers from Gartlant.

15902.「そして 湖に棲む凶悪な水竜 ギルギッシュに\n 襲われたのじゃ。キズつき 疲れ:
Then he was attacked by Gilgish, a vicious
water dragon that lived in the lake. Oren,
wounded and tired, must have had a tough time.

15903.「どうにか 水竜を 倒したものの\n この戦いに巻き込まれて パリンは\n 命に:
Although he managed to defeat the water
dragon, Pauline suffered life-threatening
injuries in the battle.

15904.「オーレンは 娘にグロリスのしずくを与えるが\n しずくのチカラは キズを治すも:
Oren gave his daughter a Droplet of Gloris,
but the power of the Droplet did not heal the
wound. Pauline died as she was.

15905.「……以来 倒された 水竜ギルギッシュは\n グロリスの木の守護者として よみが:
Since then, Gilgish, the defeated water
dragon, has been resurrected as the guardian
of the Gloris Tree and has become eternal.

15906.「おそらく グロリスのしずくの効果で\n パリンの魂が 水竜の身体と結びつき\n:
Perhaps the effect of the Droplet of Gloris
combined Pauline's soul with the body of the
water dragon, making her what she is...

15907.「お前さんも聞いた ギルギッシュの声は\n そういうことなのじゃ。\n さあ わ:
That's what you heard Girgisch say. Now, if
you understand, you may leave now.

15908.「……オーレンは どうなったかだと？\n むう。やはり そこが 気になるか。:
You know what happened to Oren? Hmm. I guess
that's what's bothering you.

15909.「だが その話は また今度じゃ。\n わしも いろいろと多忙でな。\n チグリ大:
But we'll talk about that another time. I am
also very busy. Please give my regards to
Minister Chigri.
